channel.title: [pi] adding veng to regular spell book [pi]
channel.description: I need a guide to add veng to regular spell book. I want it take runes and u can only use ever 30seconds.(make sure i dont have it replace it with any spells i want the spell book to stay the same but have veng.

item.title: [pi] adding veng to regular spell book [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

i changed the sprite and everything , i was bored lawd
here is the snippet that turns watchtowere tele into veng:
put that in clickingbuttons.java

			case 6005:
				if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 94){
				if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng > 30000) {                      
				if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,10) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075,4) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(560,2)) {
					c.vengOn = true;
					c.lastVeng = System.currentTimeMillis();
					c.startAnimation(4410);
                               		c.getItems().deleteItem(557,c.getItems().getItemSlot(557),10);
					c.getItems().deleteItem(560,c.getItems().getItemSlot(560),2);
					c.getItems().deleteItem(9075,c.getItems().getItemSlot(9075),4);
} else {		c.sendMessage("you dont have the runes required to do this spell.");
		}
		
} else {		c.sendMessage("You must wait 30 seconds before casting this again.");
		}
} else {
			c.sendMessage("you must be level 94 + mage to cast this"); 
		}

vengeh.jpg?t=1282697737764×503

[quote=“I Vain I”]Or you could just add the sprite to the interface?

That’s like 2-3 methods.

Whole lot easier than ripping a teleport and changing the sprite.[/quote]
if i simply add the veng sprite , will there still be an actionbutton for it?

Read full topic
